Catalog_Raisonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 243, horizontal ōban #091.11
inscription:
Aki no ame/ furite mo mizu no/ kakeoyogu/ sai ha mue zaru/ Tamagawa no ayu/ (Although th autumn rain has already fallen/ into the water of the jewel river/ where sweetfish live, / they are still swimming/ without regard for the changing season.)
by Haruzono no Shizueda
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Untitled series of fish known as Large Fish
title: Trout
